Title: Prohibits recurring campaign donations without affirmative consent
Summary: Prohibits recurring campaign donations without affirmative consent; provides that a candidate accepting a recurring contribution shall provide a receipt to the contributor disclosing the terms of the recurring contribution, provide all necessary information to cancel the recurring donation, and immediately cancel the recurring donation upon request.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to prohibiting recurring campaign donations without affirmative consent
